title: "Rocket Systems"

In the rocket systems group we build our own rockets. 
We have already achieved a successful launch to an altitude of 600m. 
Currently we are building a rocket that is designed to reach an altitude of 3 km. 
On this also a small experiment is to be accomplished. 
We also want to participate in competitions with the new rocket.

  <button id="prevButton"><</button>
  <button id="nextButton">></button>
  <!-- put all images here that should be available in the slideshow -->
  <img class="slideshow-img" src="Rocket_0.jpg" >
  <img class="slideshow-img" src="Rocket_1.jpg" >
  <img class="slideshow-img" src="Rocket_2.jpg" >
  <img class="slideshow-img" src="Rocket_3.jpg" >
  <style>
    #slideshow {
      position: relative;
      width: 80%;
      overflow: hidden;
    }
    #prevButton, #nextButton {
      position: absolute;
      top: 0;
      background: #0003;
      color: #fffa;
      border: none;
      font-size: 50px;
      height: 100%;
    }
    #prevButton {left: 0;}
    #nextButton {right: 0;}
    #prevButton:hover, #nextButton:hover {background: #0007;}
    .slideshow-img {
      width:100%;
      display: none;
    }
  </style>
  <script>
    const images = document.getElementsByClassName('slideshow-img');
    let index = 0;
    function switch_image(x) {
      return () => {
        images[index].style.display = 'none';
        index = (index + x + images.length) % images.length;
        images[index].style.display = 'block';
      }
    }
    document.getElementById('prevButton').addEventListener('click', switch_image(-1));
    document.getElementById('nextButton').addEventListener('click', switch_image(1));
    switch_image(0)();
  </script>
</div>
